creator: Century Games Limited
descriptionHtml:
Go on a tropical adventure to mysterious new islands and discover dragons!

Join your best friend Mia and her crew on their tropical adventure to a remote island! While there, you'll discover and collect new dragons and help build them a home on your island. How many will you find? Let's find out!

Dragonscapes Adventure is a casual energy exploring game where you find and merge dragons to discover new ones. Build a home for yourself on a tropical island and craft various products to fulfill different orders, while joining Mia on her adventures to new islands.

App Notes:

• This app requires an active internet connection to play. Please make sure your device is connected while playing.

• Dragonscapes Adventure is completely free to download and free to play. However, some items in the game may be purchased with real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.

title: Dragonscapes Adventure

container.value: 163 Tras Street 03-01, Lian Huat Building Singapore

creator: Century Games Pte. Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
Go on a tropical adventure to mysterious new islands and discover dragons!

Join your best friend Mia and her crew on their tropical adventure to a remote island! While there, you'll discover and collect new dragons and help build them a home on your island. How many will you find? Let's find out!

Dragonscapes Adventure is a casual energy exploring game where you find and merge dragons to discover new ones. Build a home for yourself on a tropical island and craft various products to fulfill different orders, while joining Mia on her adventures to new islands.

App Notes:

• This app requires an active internet connection to play. Please make sure your device is connected while playing.

• Dragonscapes Adventure is completely free to download and free to play. However, some items in the game may be purchased with real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.

title: Dragonscapes Adventure

container.value: 163 Tras Street 03-01, Lian Huat Building Singapore

creator: Century Games Pte. Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
More enjoyment of the ASMR relaxation experience.💖

It's as realistic as any video you've watched about ASMR Skincare! 💅

Pop pimples and squeeze blackheads with realistic touch and sound! Help your customers resolve skincare problems like acne, uneven skin tones, dull faces, and other issues with tons of different cosmetics to create a fashionable makeover. 🌸🌸

There are many different scenarios in the game waiting for you to try.

✨Key Features:
- ASMR blackheads, secretions, and treatment for different body parts!
- Enjoy the spa and rejuvenate after finishing your beauty treatment! 💋
- Dramatic life changes, from a sloppy girl to an elegant beauty queen! 👑
- Style yourself💄, visit friends and see how they dress themselves!
- Complete the gorgeous transformation and attend different occasions, from proms to weddings! 👛💍

✨App Notes:

• This app requires an active internet connection to play. Please make sure your device is connected while playing.

• Dragonscapes Adventure is completely free to download and free to play. However, some items in the game may be purchased with real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.

title: Dragonscapes Adventure

container.value: 163 Tras Street 03-01, Lian Huat Building Singapore

creator: Century Games Pte. Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
This is an exciting puzzle game where you need to solve different puzzles and challenges by rotating the circle to find the gap. ⭕

✨ Game Features:

- Simple and addictive gameplay is suitable for players of all ages.😍
- Multiple difficulty levels and level designs ensure the game's challenge and entertainment.
- Each level has unique goals and rules, keeping players engaged with a sense of novelty.
- Beautiful graphics and immersive sound effects 🌟provide an engaging gaming experience.
- Compete with friends, compare scores, and share your progress.🤗

✨ Gameplay:

- Players need to rotate the circle by touching the screen to align it perfectly with the gap.👆
- The circle will display various colors or patterns that need to be aligned with the center target within a given time.💛💜💚
- Each successful match increases the score and unlocks the next, more challenging level.✔️
- Pay attention to the time limit, try to complete the matches within the designated time, and avoid incorrect moves.⏱️

This game offers fun and challenges while enhancing spatial cognition and reaction speed. Whether during leisure time or while traveling, you can enjoy this addictive game.💖
descriptionShort: Rotate the circle to unravel all circles.

container.value: 163 Tras Street 03-01, Lian Huat Building Singapore

creator: Century Games PTE. LTD.
descriptionHtml:
Go on a tropical adventure to mysterious new islands and discover dragons!

Join your best friend Mia and her crew on their tropical adventure to a remote island! While there, you'll discover and collect new dragons and help build them a home on your island. How many will you find? Let's find out!

Dragonscapes Adventure is a casual energy-exploring game where you find and merge dragons to discover new ones. Build a home for yourself on a tropical island and craft various products to fulfill different orders, while joining Mia on her adventures to new islands.

App Notes:

• This app requires an active internet connection to play. Please make sure your device is connected while playing.

• Dragonscapes Adventure is completely free to download and free to play. However, some items in the game may be purchased with real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.
